column1: * 1911 – J.R.R. Tolkien signs a Oxford University visitors page.
* 1949 – Farmer Giles of Ham is published.
* 1955 – The Return of the King is published.
* 1958 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Misses E. Jones and J. Taylor.
* 1965 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Timothy J. Wheeler (20 October 1965) to Timothy J. Wheeler.

column2: the fourth episode of the The Hobbit (1968 radio series) of The Hobbit

column1: * 1994 – The War of the Jewels is published in the UK.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.

column2: Aragorn and the Travellers reach the Ford of Bruinen where they are attacked by Nazgûl. Frodo Baggins reaches the other riverside but the Riders are cast back by the water
column3: their horses drown and their robes are destroyed.
